text: The UEFA European Under-18 Championship 1958 Final Tournament was held first in Luxembourg, but matches were also played in West Germany, Belgium and France. ==Teams== The following teams entered the tournament: * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Group stage== ===Group A=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 8 2 +6 5 3 2 0 1 6 8 –2 4 3 1 1 1 6 5 +1 3 3 0 0 3 4 9 –5 0 3 April 2–0 4 April 2–2 6 April 4–0 3–1 7 April 3–4 9 April 2–1 ===Group B=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 4 3 1 0 7 3 +4 7 4 2 2 0 8 5 +3 6 4 2 0 2 9 7 +2 4 4 1 0 3 3 8 –5 2 4 0 1 3 4 8 –4 1 2 April 2–1 1–3 3 April 3–1 4 April 2–0 6 April 3–2 2–2 7 April 0–3 0–1 9 April 2–1 1–1 ===Group C=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 4 2 1 1 5 3 +2 5 4 2 1 1 6 5 +1 5 4 2 0 2 7 7 0 4 4 1 1 2 3 4 –1 3 4 1 1 2 1 3 –2 3 2 April 1–0 3–2 4 April 2–1 abd (0–0) (match abandoned) 5 April 1–0 3–1 6 April 0–1 (replay) 7 April 2–0 3–2 9 April 0–0 0–0 ===Group D=== Teams Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 8 2 +6 5 3 2 1 0 7 4 +3 5 3 1 0 2 4 4 0 2 3 0 0 3 2 11 –9 0 5 April 2–2 3–1 7 April 3–1 0–1 9 April 5–0 2–1 ==Semifinals== ==Third place match== ==Final== ==Other websites == *Results by RSSSF Category:UEFA European Under-19 Championship Category:1958 in European football
title: 1958 UEFA European Under-18 Championship
